level.text: This chapter shall apply to employment agencies, employment counseling services, employer-paid personnel services, and job listing services as defined by the Employment Services Licensing and Regulation Act of 1984, D.C. Law 5-136, D.C. Code ยง36-1001 et seq. (1981), hereinafter referred to as the “Act.”
The Director may, for good cause shown, waive any of the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is the Employment Services Licensing and Regulation Act of 1984, D.C. Law 5-136, D.C. Code ยง 36-1001 et seq. (1981), Mayor’s Order 86-9, issued January 16, 1986, 33 DCR 942 (February 14, 1986).
